name: The Dragon Tamer
description:
Adds a character called The Dragon Tamer, who fights together with his faithful dragon.

- Adds 75 cards and 12 relics.


v1.1.1 (2021-01-03)
Compatibility update
- The following modded enemies now correctly target the Front.
  - Daughter of Heaven (from Gensokyo) [Thanks to gkjzhgffjh for reporting]
  - Grand Snecko (from Hubris) [Thanks to Jakori for reporting]
- Fixed softlock with Resonance Form when you have Gungeon Mod (and possibly others) enabled. [Thanks to zhongnian for reporting]

Card changes
- Low Kick: Damage 8(11) -> 9(12)
- Overwhelm: Lose HP equal to 3(4) -> 3(5) times the enemy's Weak.
- Fiery Synthesis: Damage 5(8) -> 6(9)
- Excess Footwork: Dexterity 6(7) -> 7(9)

Other changes
- When an enemy is taunted by another enemy (via Mind Bender), it now applies Weak or Poison if it intends to apply those, and Vulnerable otherwise. The amount of debuff is now equal to their intended amount. (Instead of always applying 1 Vulnerable)


v1.1.2 (2021-01-09)
- Fix crash with Menagerie mod.


For older patch notes, see: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/2301555870
